segments.text: What's the latest fashion of evening gown ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The one on the manikin is in fashion now .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I would like to try on one in violet .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK , here you are . You look really attractive in that gown .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you . Do you have some other colors ?
segments.speaker: S1
